sourcesContent:
import {
    Modal,
    ModalOverlay,
    ModalContent,
    ModalHeader,
    ModalFooter,
    ModalBody,
    ModalCloseButton,
    Button,
    Image,
    Grid,
    GridItem,
    FormControl,
    Spacer,
    Flex
  } from '@chakra-ui/react'
  import Select from 'react-select'
  import { Formik, Form, Field } from 'formik';

  export default function ClothingModal(props: any) {
    const getDefaultColors = (colors: string) => {
      let colorArray = colors?.split(",")
      let defaultColors = []
      for (let i = 0; i < colorArray?.length; i++)
      {
        defaultColors.push({value: colorArray[i], label: colorArray[i]} ,)
      }

      return defaultColors
    }

    //console.log(props.isOpen)
    const typeOptions = [
      { value: 'Dress', label: 'Dress' },
      { value: 'Jacket', label: 'Jacket' },
      { value: 'Pants', label: 'Pants' },
      { value: 'Shorts', label: 'Shorts' },
      { value: 'Pants', label: 'Pants' },
      { value: 'Shoes', label: 'Shoes' },
      { value: 'Skirt', label: 'Skirt' },
      { value: 'Sweater', label: 'Sweater' },
    ];

    const colorOptions = [
      { value: 'red', label: 'red' },
      { value: 'orange', label: 'orange' },
      { value: 'yellow', label: 'yellow' },
      { value: 'green', label: 'green' },
      { value: 'blue', label: 'blue' },
      { value: 'purple', label: 'purple' },
      { value: 'pink', label: 'pink' },
      { value: 'black', label: 'black' },
      { value: 'brown', label: 'brown' },
      { value: 'gray', label: 'gray' },
      { value: 'white', label: 'white' },
    ];

    const updateClothing = (values: any) =>
    {
        console.log(values)
    }

    return (
      <>
      <Button onClick={props.onOpen}>Open Modal</Button>
        <Modal isOpen={props.isOpen} onClose={props.onClose} size="lg">
          <ModalOverlay />
            <ModalContent>
              
              <Form>
                <ModalHeader m={6}>Update Clothing</ModalHeader>
                <ModalCloseButton />
                <ModalBody>
                    <Grid
                      h='100%'
                      templateColumns='repeat(9, 1fr)'
                      gap={4}
                      ml={6}
                      mr={6}
                    >
                      <GridItem colSpan={3} rowSpan={10} bg='transparent'>
                        <Image
                          src={"/" + props.clothing?.image}
                          alt={"Clothing " + props.clothing?.id}
                          borderRadius='lg'
                        />
                      </GridItem>
                      <GridItem colSpan={2} bg='transparent'>
                        Type
                      </GridItem>
                      <GridItem colSpan={3} bg='transparent' mb={8}>
                        <Field name='type'>
                          <Select options={typeOptions} defaultValue={{value: props.clothing?.type, label: props.clothing?.type}} />
                        </Field>
                      </GridItem>
                      <GridItem colSpan={2} bg='transparent'>
                        Color(s)
                      </GridItem>
                      <GridItem colSpan={3} bg='transparent'>
                        <Field name='colors'>
                          <Select options={colorOptions} defaultValue={getDefaultColors(props.clothing?.colors)} isMulti={true}/>
                        </Field>
                      </GridItem>
                    </Grid>
                </ModalBody>
                <ModalFooter>
                  <Button bg='red.400' color='white' mr={6} mb={6} size='lg' onClick={props.onClose}>
                    Close
                  </Button>
                  <Button bg='red.100' color='white' mr={6} mb={6} size='lg' type='submit'>Update</Button>
                </ModalFooter>
              </Form>
          </ModalContent>
        </Modal>
      </>
    )
  }
